text: The 1997 Australian Individual Speedway Championship was held at the Brisbane Exhibition Ground in Brisbane, Queensland on 28 December 1996. This was the final time (as of 2014) that the "Ekka" has hosted an Australian Solo Championship.1997 World Speedway results Defending champion Craig Boyce won his third and final Australian Championship, once again scoring a 15-point maximum from his five rides. Jason Crump finished second for the second straight year after defeating South Australian Champion Ryan Sullivan and former three time national champion Leigh Adams in a runoff when all three riders finished on 13 points. ==1997 Australian Solo Championship== * Australian Championship * 28 December 1996 * Brisbane, Queensland - Brisbane Exhibition Ground * Referee: * Qualification: The top four riders go through to the Overseas Final in Bradford, England. {| class=wikitable !width=25px|Pos. ||width=200px|Rider ||width=40px|Points ||width=70px|Details |-align=center |Gold ||align=left| Craig Boyce () ||15 || |-align=center |Silver ||align=left| Jason Crump () ||13+3 || |-align=center |Bronze ||align=left| Ryan Sullivan () ||13+2 || |-align=center |4 ||align=left| Leigh Adams () ||13+1 || |-align=center |5 ||align=left| Craig Watson () ||10 || |-align=center |6 ||align=left| Shane Parker () ||10 || |-align=center |7 ||align=left| Jason Lyons () ||8 || |-align=center |8 ||align=left| Stephen Davies () ||7 || |-align=center |9 ||align=left| Mark Lemon () ||7 || |-align=center |10 ||align=left| Mick Poole () ||6 || |-align=center |11 ||align=left| Tony Rose () ||5 || |-align=center |12 ||align=left| Mark Keast () ||5 || |-align=center |13 ||align=left| Brett Woodifield () ||3 || |-align=center |14 ||align=left| Lee Redmond () ||2 || |-align=center |15 ||align=left| Jason Stewart () ||1 || |-align=center |16 ||align=left| Brent Collyer () (Res) ||1 || |-align=center |16 ||align=left| Matt Johnson () ||0 || |} ==References== ==See also== * Australia national speedway team * Sport in Australia Category:Speedway in Australia Australia Individual Speedway Championship
